content: tapioca the capybara is here tapioca is a fashionable little creature the recipe is completely no sew and she comes with three hat choices for you to customize your friend tapioca makes a great desk buddy or even a cute keychain come be part if the tapioca troupe finished size 7cm will vary depending on your yarn difficulty level intermediate average completion time 2h terminology us for personal use only you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items made with this pattern provided you credit @criaturascrochet as the designer do not repost tag me @criaturascrochet on instagram with your creation i would love to see it and feel free to reach out in case of questions
